articles.author: Gordon Lubold, Nancy A. Youssef
articles.title: Biden Approves Pentagon Plan to Help Americans Fleeing Ukraine if Russia Invades - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: U.S. troops will set up checkpoints and tent camps inside Poland’s border to help Americans who leave Ukraine
articles.content: WASHINGTONThe White House has approved a Pentagon plan for U.S. troops in Poland to help thousands of Americans likely to flee Ukraine if Russia attacks, as the Biden administration tries to avoid th… [+480 chars]

articles.author: Simon Smale
articles.title: Belle Brockhoff suffers Beijing 2022 heartache in snowboard cross final as Lindsey Jacobellis finally finds form 16 years on - ABC News
articles.description: Belle Brockhoff rides a series of insane moments to reach the snowboard cross final at Beijing 2022, only to finish a heartbreaking fourth behind American Lindsey Jacobellis, someone who knows just how quickly a medal can be won or lost.
articles.content:
Snowboard cross can be a brutal sport.
Winning gold hinges on insane moments, be they impossible overtakes, a Bradbury-style leg-up thanks to an opponent's crash, or the sheer grit to see a gap and … [+4232 chars]

articles.title: How's the COVID Antiviral Drug Debut Going? And How You Can Track Down The Meds - American Council on Science and Health
articles.description: It's been an interesting month COVID-wise. The COVID antivirals made their way to pharmacies. All in all, things went pretty well (unless you happen to be Merck). Here, you'll learn how to locate pharmacies in your area that have been selected to carry the dr…
articles.content: I recently wrote an article comparing the availability and use of the two newly approved anti-COVID drugs (1) Paxlovid and molnupiravir. Bottom line: Doctors and patients voted with their scripts. Wh… [+3726 chars]

articles.title: Eileen Gu’s gold-medal display melts hearts and crashes internet - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Chinese-American’s storming big air win overshadows repeated questions over her nationality, surprise appearance by tennis player Peng Shuai, and world-record breaking routine from figure skater Nathan Chen.

articles.title: Figure skating: Chen scores world record for massive lead over shocked Hanyu - CNA
